title: Jordan Womens WMNS AIR Jordan 1 MID BQ6472 010 Black Snakeskin - Size 7W
description: The Nike Air Jordan 1 Mid shoes are inspired by the most popular sneakers launched in 1985 at the foot of a young promise of NBA basketball that over the years will become the strongest player of all times: his name is Michael Jordan. Made with a leather upper, perforated on the forefoot for greater breathability, it is made with a lower mid height of the model from which it takes inspiration, for greater freedom of movement. The main features of these shoes are the classic Nike swoosh on the sides and the jumpman brand at the top of the tongue. The model is complemented by the Nike Air midsole, which makes the sneakers comfortable and cushioned. Lightness and comfort are the main features for these shoes with an unmistakable look.
details: {"Product Dimensions": "11 x 4 x 7 inches; 3 Pounds", "Item model number": "BQ6472-010", "Department": "womens", "Date First Available": "October 23, 2021", "Manufacturer": "Nike"}
